spawn.name: Schemtaica Underground Transportation CO-OP
spawn.description: A greasy, oily smell hangs in the air, mingling with the metallic tang of rust and something vaguely like burnt sugar.  The station's entrance is a chaotic jumble of pipes, levers, and flickering lights, all humming in a symphony of mechanical groans.  You can hear a low drone from somewhere deeper within the station.

sut_north_line.name: SUT North Platform
sut_north_line.description: The air hangs thick with coal dust and damp wool. A single flickering lamp casts long shadows on the worn wooden platform where a few goblins huddle around a ledger, their voices hushed in the gloom.  Their work is slow; their deals are small.

sut_northbound_platform.name: SUT Northbound PLatform
sut_northbound_platform.description: The air is thick with the smell of coal smoke and damp earth.  A low rumble echoes from the north as a metal grate groans open to reveal an almost-empty platform.  You feel a draft on your face, the wind biting at your cheeks.

sut_southbound_platform.name: SUT Southbound Platform
sut_southbound_platform.description: The air smells of brine and fish as you stand on the SUT platform.  A rhythmic hum vibrates through the floorboards, punctuated by the distant clang of metal against metal. A faint warmth clings to the air, almost like a sigh.
